H0.text: Who was known as the ‘Waltz King’ of Vienna. Franz Lehár

H1.text: Who was known as the ‘Waltz King’ of Vienna. Carl Michael Ziehrer

H2.text: Who was known as the ‘Waltz King’ of Vienna. Joseph Lanner

H3.text: Who was known as the ‘Waltz King’ of Vienna. Strauss II

A4.text: In his lifetime, he was known as 'The Waltz King', as he played a major role in popularizing the waltz in the 19th century.
